Childlike.text: Hee-ho! You wanna be my friend?

answers.text: Of course! Let's be best friends.
Only if you're strong enough.
I don't have time for games.

Childlike.text: If I join you, will you give me lots of candy?

answers.text: All the candy you can eat.
You'll have to earn it.
Candy is bad for your teeth.

Childlike.text: Hey, hey! What's your favorite thing to do in the whole world?

answers.text: Exploring and finding secrets!
Training to get stronger.
I enjoy my privacy.

Childlike.text: I'm scared of the dark... will you hold my hand?

answers.text: Don't worry, I'll protect you.
Be brave, you're a warrior!
Grow up already.

Childlike.text: Are you a good guy or a bad guy? I can't tell!

answers.text: I'm whatever you want me to be.
I'm a hero of justice!
I'm your worst nightmare.

Arrogant.text: Hmph. Do you truly believe you are worthy of my power?

answers.text: Your power is magnificent. I am not worthy, but I ask for it anyway.
Let's find out together.
My power is far greater than yours.

Arrogant.text: The weak exist only to serve the strong. Do you not agree?

answers.text: That is the law of the universe.
Strength comes in many forms.
The strong should protect the weak.

Arrogant.text: Why do you struggle so? The end of this world is inevitable.

answers.text: I struggle to create something new.
It is my nature to fight.
Quiet, you know nothing of hope.

Arrogant.text: Tell me, human... what do you value more? Knowledge or gold?

answers.text: The wisdom to rule.
Gold, to command the world.
Love and companionship.

Arrogant.text: If I join you, I expect to be treated with absolute reverence.

answers.text: A king deserves no less.
We will be equal partners.
You'll do as you're told.

Timid.text: U-umm... you won't... hurt me, will you?

answers.text: I promise I'll keep you safe.
The world is a dangerous place.
Only if you step out of line.

Timid.text: It's so scary out here... I don't know what to do...

answers.text: Stay with me. We can be brave together.
Then you should just run away.
The darkness is where we belong.

Timid.text: D-do you think... someone like me can really be useful?

answers.text: You have a power no one else sees.
Every soul has its purpose.
Probably not, but I need meat-shields.

Timid.text: I feel like everyone is watching me... why are they looking?

answers.text: Because you radiate a unique light.
They are just curious about you.
They're waiting for you to fail.

Timid.text: W-would you leave me behind if I got hurt?

answers.text: Never. I don't abandon my allies.
I'd do my best to bring you back.
Only the strong survive in my party.

Sultry.text: Well now... aren't you a handsome devil? What is it you want from me?

answers.text: I'm captivated by you. I want your power.
I'm looking for allies.
Just another demon in my way.

Sultry.text: Don't you think this fighting is so... pointless? There are better ways to spend our time.

answers.text: Perhaps you could show me?
This is a matter of life and death.
Battle is the ultimate passion.

Sultry.text: Love is a trap that leads to ruin. Wouldn't you agree?

answers.text: Then let's be ruined together.
It is a temporary distraction.
Love is the only thing that matters.

Sultry.text: You have such intense eyes... what are you thinking about right now?

answers.text: Our future victory.
How to defeat the next enemy.
None of your business.

Sultry.text: Tell me a secret... something no one else knows.

answers.text: I have the power to change this world.
I'm actually quite nervous right now.
I don't trust strangers with secrets.

Honorable.text: State your purpose. Why do you seek my strength?

answers.text: I seek justice, and your strength is righteous.
To survive this cursed world.
For my own personal gain.

Honorable.text: Would you sacrifice one of your own comrades to achieve your goal?

answers.text: Never. My bonds are my strength.
The mission comes first. Sacrifices are necessary.
It would depend on the goal.

Honorable.text: A warrior's greatest weapon is not their blade, but their spirit. Do you agree?

answers.text: Indeed. A broken spirit leads to a broken blade.
Discipline is what truly matters.
Results are the only thing that matters.

Honorable.text: If we were to face a god, would you stand your ground or flee?

answers.text: I would stand until my last breath.
I would find a strategic advantage.
I'm not suicidal.

Honorable.text: Is there truly any honor left in this dying world?

answers.text: Honor exists as long as we uphold it.
It is a rare and precious thing.
Honor is a lie for the foolish.

Gloomy.text: It's all so meaningless... Why do you even bother fighting?

answers.text: Because even in darkness, there's a reason to hope.
To find my own meaning.
You're right. It's pointless.

Gloomy.text: We're all just going to die anyway. Join me... and we can fade into nothingness together.

answers.text: I'm not ready to give up yet.
Fine by me.
Perhaps death is the ultimate peace.

Gloomy.text: Does it hurt? The burden of being alive?

answers.text: The pain reminds me that I'm still here.
It is a weight I've grown used to.
I don't feel anything anymore.

Gloomy.text: Every beautiful thing eventually withers and rots. Why bother loving anything?

answers.text: Because the brief moment of beauty is worth it.
To leave something behind for others.
You're right, love is a waste.

Gloomy.text: I can hear the shadows whispering... can you hear them too?

answers.text: I listen, and I do not fear them.
I hear only the wind.
Get away from me, freak.

Upbeat.text: Hey! Hey! You look like you're going somewhere fun! Can I come?

answers.text: The more the merrier! Let's go!
I suppose your power could be useful.
This is a serious journey, not a party.

Upbeat.text: Wow, you're super strong! We'd be an unstoppable team, don't you think?

answers.text: Totally! Together, we can take on the world!
I'm looking for dependable allies.
Don't get ahead of yourself.

Upbeat.text: Life is just one big adventure! What's the next destination?

answers.text: To the top of the tower!
Wherever the road takes us.
To a place where I can finally rest.

Upbeat.text: Check out this cool rock I found! Isn't it awesome?

answers.text: It's beautiful! You have a good eye.
It's... just a rock.
Don't show me trash.

Upbeat.text: I love making new friends! You want to be my bestie?

answers.text: I'd be honored!
Let's see how you fight first.
I'm not here to make friends.

Formal.text: It is my assessment that an alliance would be mutually beneficial. Do you concur?

answers.text: I concur. Let us form a pact.
Your logic is sound.
I don't make deals with demons.

Formal.text: Please state the terms of our potential contract. What is it that you offer in exchange for my services?

answers.text: A chance to witness a new world's creation.
Macca. Lots of it.
Your life. Join me or perish.

Formal.text: Efficiency is the cornerstone of any successful operation. How do you manage your team?

answers.text: With calculated precision and absolute trust.
By following a strict hierarchy.
We just wing it.

Formal.text: I require an environment that respects the established protocols of engagement.

answers.text: I maintain the highest standards of combat protocol.
I will do my best to accommodate you.
Rules are meant to be broken.

Formal.text: Human behavior is often illogical. Why do you choose to fight against your own kind?

answers.text: To ensure a future that is mathematically superior.
It is a matter of necessity.
Because I feel like it.

Childlike: Hey, I know you! My brother says hi!
Hee-ho! Another one of us! Fun!
Arrogant: Hmph. So you run with my kind. I suppose you have some taste.
Another of my clan follows you. You must have some merit.
Timid: O-oh... you already have a friend like me... That's nice.
You seem kind... just like my sibling...
Sultry: Well now... you certainly have a type, don't you, darling?
I see you already have company. Pity.
Honorable: I see the banner of my clan is already with you. A wise choice.
You keep good company. I will not interfere.
Gloomy: Another soul bound to your fate... How tragic.
It doesn't matter... We all end up in the same place.
Upbeat: Whoa! You know my pal! Awesome!
Hey, tell my buddy I said what's up!
Formal: It appears you already have a contract with one of my kind. I will not infringe.
A prior agreement is in place. I shall take my leave.
